# GitHub Copilot Instructions

See [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) in the repository root for AI coding assistant guidelines.

This project follows the voxpelli Node.js module style. Key points:

- ESM + CJS dual module support
- TypeScript types via JSDoc annotations
- Neostandard code style (single quotes, semicolons, 2-space indent)
- Mocha + Chai testing
- Strict type coverage (>99%)

Run `npm test` to validate all checks pass before committing.
